changeSet.author: abhishekptl

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 1713;

changeSet.comment: Updating cvterm WITHDRAWAL for column header name change
changeSet.sql: update cvterm set name='TOTAL WITHDRAWALS' where cvterm_id = 1713;

changeSet.author: abhishekptl

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 1738;

changeSet.comment: New cvterm RESERVATION for column header
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cvterm VALUES (1738, 1000, 'RESERVATION', 'Total of single permitted open reservation', null, 0, 0);

changeSet.author: abhishekptl

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 1739;

changeSet.comment: New cvterm LOT STATUS for column header
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cvterm VALUES (1739, 1000, 'LOT STATUS', 'Lot status active (open) or closed', null, 0, 0);
